
# ePaymentsglobal.com

## General 
 
**Code:** `epaymentsglobalcom` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] ePaymentsglobal.com 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  ePaymentsglobal has integrated Payment Gateway of a leading bank to ensure 'Zero' downtime of our payment gateway services. All you do is register with ePaymentsglobal and you can utilise the best services these major payment gateway at almost negligible costs.Â  Nobody in India today, not even the Financial Institutions of India providing e-com solutions, offers such a wide bouquet of payment gateway solutions as ePaymentsglobal does. And this bouquet is growing; as ePaymentsglobal continuously works towards integrating as many online Indian and Foreign Banks as possible, all of whom offer Net Banking facilities to their clients. ePaymentsglobal gives your business the 'profit edge' with comprehensive, affordable e-commerce solutions! It is the only payment gateway in India leaving you to focus on more important issues, like new business initiatives and competitive marketing strategies.  
 
**Address:** 
street:  India
